Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory61.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Are you ready, Lucia?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Ready. Lee, activate the tactical terminal.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Understood.', 4: '2'}
{2: "What's going on?", 3: '9', 4: 'Are there any enemies?'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "Here's the thing, Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "I'd ask Lee to organize relevant information of this stage into a copy of readable data.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "While Lee activates the tactical terminal, I'll upload our data to the terminal to save time for explanation.", 4: '1'}
{2: "It's a routine.", 3: '16', 4: 'Well done!', 5: '16'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Thank you, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'The memory prototype of this mission is Athmail, once the captain of the vanguard squad of Moe Army, and one of the generals of Marshal Cottie.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Vanguard... such a familiar combat type. I've got a hunch that he'll be a trouble.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "Hi, we're the Gray Raven.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Athmail', 3: "Please explain to me what's with that World Government?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'The World Government is a global unified government created by "Dominik" the hero to unite the power of all mankind...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Athmail', 3: "So, what about the marshal's Moe Army?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'According to history, your organization existed until the World Government is formed and was probably absorbed by it along with other organizations.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Athmail', 3: 'Are you saying that the Moe Army, us, have all become the ashes of history?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "No... it's not like that.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'I believe you know it better than anyone the importance of peace and unity in the world.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "At least, with the World Government, you won't have to fight for the rights and interests of LOLI any more.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Please adapt to the changes of the times at ease.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Athmail', 3: "...I understand it. But I can't calm down!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Ka-chaâ€”'}
{2: 'Is the terminal closed?', 3: '50', 4: 'Is this also a part of the routine...', 5: '50'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Yeah, it's a part of it.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Alright, memory: Athmail. Test passed and recycle completed.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: '...Is this really okay?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'The well-preserved parts of the Moe Army... are something important...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Commandant, the record of our battles, and the idea of fighting for something to protect... are not completely gone.', 4: '1'}
{2: "We'll explain it next time.", 3: '58', 4: 'Cottie would understand.', 5: '58'}
